title: account
body: when i want to prush play i cant ? this is first p to me happend

replies.body: It sounds like when you hit play, the patcher doesn't continue to start the client? If that's the case, try running through our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure your OS isn't blocking the client from opening. Let me know if that doesn't help though!
